Key Match Events: India struggled with Rahul falling early and Rohit being scratchy
Buttler was top-class with his proactive captaincy
Hardik Pandya smashed 50 in the last four overs
Pre-Game Insights: India started slow, struggled in the middle-order
India were headed for a lowly finish otherwise
Post-Match Reflections: England bounced back from a defeat to Ireland, a washout against Australia and two backs-to-the-walls performances
India have fallen short in another ICC event
This is a total just above par for the venue but feels a little underwhelming still against England's brawny batting
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is superb game management from England
India have been flat on the field from the start
No swing on offer, so no teeth in the bowling
Others: England's response to India's 168 was absolutely faultless
India hardly had a sniff in the 16 overs of bowling
There will be the pressure of a big game so it could still be a close affair from here
